title: Create FO-05 directory structure and layout files
description:
Create the FO-05 route structure mirroring FO-04.

Files to create:
- `app/fo-05/page.tsx` - Main page (minimal, delegates to fo-experience)
- `app/fo-05/layout.tsx` - Server layout
- `app/fo-05/fo-05-layout-client.tsx` - Client layout with TopSubmenu
- `app/fo-05/info/page.tsx` - Info page explaining sentence fragment approach

Copy structure from `app/fo-04/` and update references to fo-05.

For info page, explain:
- The 'sentence fragment' approach to lowering writing friction
- How 'Inspiration' reveals AI-generated sentence starters
- That fragments append to existing text (users can combine multiple)
- The 'Continue typing' flow after selecting a fragment
- Same overall process as FO-04, different input UX
acceptance_criteria: app/fo-05/page.tsx exists; app/fo-05/layout.tsx exists; app/fo-05/fo-05-layout-client.tsx exists; app/fo-05/info/page.tsx exists; npm run build succeeds
